segments.text: Observing this kitchen, it's a typical domestic setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is at the sink area, handling a dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet is running, basin full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflow reaches the floor, forming a pool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands with one foot in it, expression unchanged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, stacked crockery waits.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on stool, accessing upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He grasps at the cookie container.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby, arm extended in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Scene captures routine with underlying activity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains pulled back allow natural light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, a snapshot of home life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between inside and out is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
